About me

Successful, energized Information and Network Security professional +12 years experience in IT and providing Cyber Security solution for IT business and network maintenance. Administer Business Process Automation for Digital IT transformation. In-depth knowledge of modern LAN including fibre optic, WAN (VSAT & Satellite TV) and MAN technology protocols, including; vulnerability assessment and penetration testing (VAPT), networking and system administration.

Hands-on experience in configuring and installing software, testing, troubleshooting and repairing desktop / laptop computers and peripherals. Demonstrated ability to utilize a range of hardware and software testing tools and techniques. ITIL Certified.
